Adaptability.name: Adaptability
Adaptability.effect: Adaptability increases the effectiveness of STAB moves from the usual 1.5× to 2×.

Aerilate.name: Aerilate
Aerilate.effect: Aerilate causes all Normal -type attacking moves used by the Pokémon to become Flying -type, and increase in power by 20%.

Aftermath.name: Aftermath
Aftermath.effect: If an attacker faints a Pokémon with Aftermath using a contact move, the attacker will lose 1 ⁄ 4 of their maximum HP.

Air Lock.name: Air Lock
Air Lock.effect: Air Lock suppresses all effects brought on by weather, including move power increases, end-of-turn damage, accuracy changes, relevant abilities and so on.

Analytic.name: Analytic
Analytic.effect: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

Anger Point.name: Anger Point
Anger Point.effect: Anger Point raises the ability-bearer's Attack to its maximum level - +6 stages or 4× usual power - when a move targeting it receives a critical hit.

Anger Shell.name: Anger Shell
Anger Shell.effect: When the Pokémon's HP drops below half, Anger Shell lowers its Defense and Special Defense but its Attack, Special Attack and Speed are raised.

Anticipation.name: Anticipation
Anticipation.effect: A Pokémon with Anticipation will shudder upon entering battle, if an opponent has a move that is super-effective against it, or a One-Hit-KO move ( Fissure , Horn Drill , Guillotine or Sheer Cold ). It only activates when the ability-bearer switches in, not when an opponent switches in.

Arena Trap.name: Arena Trap
Arena Trap.effect: Arena Trap prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out. Raised Pokémon are not affected.

Armor Tail.name: Armor Tail
Armor Tail.effect: Armor Tail prevents the opponent from using any moves that have priority, such as Quick Attack .

Aroma Veil.name: Aroma Veil
Aroma Veil.effect: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

As One.name: As One
As One.effect: Combines Unnerve and Chilling Neigh/Grim Neigh

Aura Break.name: Aura Break
Aura Break.effect: Aura Break cancels the effects of the abilities Fairy Aura and Dark Aura and instead reduces the power of Dark-type and Fairy-type moves by 25%, for all Pokémon on the field.

Bad Dreams.name: Bad Dreams
Bad Dreams.effect: Bad Dreams causes all sleeping opponents to lose 1 ⁄ 8 of their maximum HP at the end of each turn.

Ball Fetch.name: Ball Fetch
Ball Fetch.effect: If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the Poké Ball from the first failed throw of the battle.

Battery.name: Battery
Battery.effect: Battery allows the Pokémon to raise the power of teammates' special moves.

Battle Armor.name: Battle Armor
Battle Armor.effect: Battle Armor prevents the Pokémon from receiving a critical hit.

Battle Bond.name: Battle Bond
Battle Bond.effect: Battle Bond causes Greninja to transform into Ash-Greninja when it KOs an opponent.

Beads of Ruin.name: Beads of Ruin
Beads of Ruin.effect: Lowers Special Defense of all Pokémon except itself.

Beast Boost.name: Beast Boost
Beast Boost.effect: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.effect: Berserk raises the Pokémon's Special Attack by one stage when its HP falls below 50%.

Big Pecks.name: Big Pecks
Big Pecks.effect: Big Pecks prevents the ability-bearer's Defense stat from being lowered, for example via Tail Whip .

Blaze.name: Blaze
Blaze.effect: Blaze increases the power of Fire -type moves by 50% (1.5×) when the ability-bearer's HP falls below a third of its maximum (known in-game as in a pinch ).

Bulletproof.name: Bulletproof
Bulletproof.effect: Bulletproof makes the Pokémon immune to ball and bomb moves.

Cheek Pouch.name: Cheek Pouch
Cheek Pouch.effect: Cheek Pouch restores the bearer's HP when a Berry is consumed, on top of the berry's usual effects.

Chilling Neigh.name: Chilling Neigh
Chilling Neigh.effect: Boosts Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.

Chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll
Chlorophyll.effect: Chlorophyll doubles the ability-bearer's Speed during bright sunshine .

Clear Body.name: Clear Body
Clear Body.effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

Cloud Nine.name: Cloud Nine
Cloud Nine.effect: Cloud Nine suppresses all effects brought on by weather, including move power increases, end-of-turn damage, accuracy changes, relevant abilities and so on.

Color Change.name: Color Change
Color Change.effect: Color Change changes the ability-bearer's type, when hit by a damage dealing move, to the type of that move. For example being hit by X Scissor will change the Pokémon to Bug -type. Dual-type Pokémon change to single-types.

Comatose.name: Comatose
Comatose.effect: Comatose causes the Pokémon to behave as if it were asleep, though it doesn't officially have the Sleep status condition. It can still use its regular moves, but cannot be inflicted with any major status condition (sleep, poison, paralysis, burn, or freeze).

Commander.name: Commander
Commander.effect: Goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field.

Competitive.name: Competitive
Competitive.effect: Competitive raises the ability-bearer's Special Attack by two stages when hit by a stat-lowering move.

Compound Eyes.name: Compound Eyes
Compound Eyes.effect: Compound Eyes raises the ability-bearer's accuracy by 30%.

Contrary.name: Contrary
Contrary.effect: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

Corrosion.name: Corrosion
Corrosion.effect: Corrosion allows the bearer to poison any Pokémon, including Steel and Poison types.

Costar.name: Costar
Costar.effect: Copies ally's stat changes on entering battle.

Cotton Down.name: Cotton Down
Cotton Down.effect: When a Pokémon with Cotton Down is hit by an attack, it lowers the attacker's Speed.

Cud Chew.name: Cud Chew
Cud Chew.effect: Cud Chew causes the Pokémon to reuse an already consumed Berry at the end of the next turn.

Curious Medicine.name: Curious Medicine
Curious Medicine.effect: Resets all stat changes upon entering battlefield.

Cursed Body.name: Cursed Body
Cursed Body.effect: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

Cute Charm.name: Cute Charm
Cute Charm.effect: If a Pokémon with Cute Charm is hit by a move that makes contact, there is a 30% chance the attacker will become infatuated. It will not infatuate Pokémon of the same gender, genderless Pokémon, nor those with the ability Oblivious .

Damp.name: Damp
Damp.effect: Damp prevents all Pokémon on the field from using the moves Selfdestruct and Explosion . It also prevents damage (to the Damp Pokémon only) from the ability Aftermath .

Dancer.name: Dancer
Dancer.effect: When another Pokémon on the field uses any Dance move, Dancer causes the ability-bearer to use that same move immediately afterward. They will still use their own move originally selected, at the usual time (e.g. after the opponent if they are slower).

Dark Aura.name: Dark Aura
Dark Aura.effect: Dark Aura raises the power of Dark-type moves by 33% for all Pokémon on the field (not just the ability-bearer).

Dazzling.name: Dazzling
Dazzling.effect: Dazzling makes the Pokémon immune to high-priority moves (i.e. those with a priority above 0).

Defeatist.name: Defeatist
Defeatist.effect: When the HP of a Pokémon with Defeatist falls below 50%, its Attack and Special Attack stats are halved.

Defiant.name: Defiant
Defiant.effect: Defiant raises the ability-bearer's Attack by two stages when hit by a stat-lowering move.

Delta Stream.name: Delta Stream
Delta Stream.effect: Delta Stream creates strong winds when the ability is activated (by Rayquaza Mega-Evolving).

Desolate Land.name: Desolate Land
Desolate Land.effect: Desolate Land creates extremely harsh sunlight when the ability is activated (by Groudon reverting to its Primal form).

Disguise.name: Disguise
Disguise.effect: Disguise allows the bearer to avoid damage for one attack, in a similar way to Substitute .

Download.name: Download
Download.effect: Download raises either the bearer's Attack or Special Attack by one stage when switching into battle, base on the opponent's defenses.

Dragon's Maw.name: Dragon's Maw
Dragon's Maw.effect: Dragon's Maw increases the power of Dragon-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%.

Drizzle.name: Drizzle
Drizzle.effect: Drizzle creates a rain shower when the ability-bearer enters battle. The effect lasts 5 turns, unless it is cleared via Air Lock or Cloud Nine or replaced by another weather condition.

Drought.name: Drought
Drought.effect: Drought creates harsh sunlight when the ability-bearer enters battle. The effect lasts 5 turns, unless it is cleared via Air Lock or Cloud Nine or replaced by another weather condition.

Early Bird.name: Early Bird
Early Bird.effect: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

Earth Eater.name: Earth Eater
Earth Eater.effect: Restores HP when hit by a Ground-type move.

Effect Spore.name: Effect Spore
Effect Spore.effect: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

Electric Surge.name: Electric Surge
Electric Surge.effect: Electric Surge creates a low-lying electric field, like the move Electric Terrain , when the Pokémon enters battle. It prevents grounded Pokémon from falling asleep, and increases the power of Electric type attacks.

Electromorphosis.name: Electromorphosis
Electromorphosis.effect: If a Pokémon with Electromorphosis is hit by an attack, the power of the next Electric-type move it uses is doubled.

Embody Aspect.name: Embody Aspect
Embody Aspect.effect: Embody Aspect boosts a particular stat, depending on the form of a Terastallized Ogerpon :

Emergency Exit.name: Emergency Exit
Emergency Exit.effect: Switches out when HP falls below 50%.

Fairy Aura.name: Fairy Aura
Fairy Aura.effect: Fairy Aura raises the power of Fairy-type moves by 33%, for all Pokémon on the field (not just the ability-bearer).

Filter.name: Filter
Filter.effect: Filter reduces the damage taken from super-effective attacks by 25%.

Flame Body.name: Flame Body
Flame Body.effect: If a Pokémon with Flame Body is hit by a move that makes contact, there is a 30% chance the attacker will become burned.

Flare Boost.name: Flare Boost
Flare Boost.effect: Powers up special attacks when burned.

Flash Fire.name: Flash Fire
Flash Fire.effect: When a Pokémon with Flash Fire is hit by a Fire-type move, it does not deal damage but instead raises the power of the bearer's Fire-type moves by 50%. Subsequent hits do not raise the power even more, but the effect remains while the ability-bearer is in battle.

Flower Gift.name: Flower Gift
Flower Gift.effect: Flower Gift raises the Attack and Special Defense of all party Pokémon by 50% during harsh sunlight.

Flower Veil.name: Flower Veil
Flower Veil.effect: Flower Veil prevents ally Grass-type Pokémon's stats from being lowered, in double and triple battles.

Fluffy.name: Fluffy
Fluffy.effect: Fluffy reduces damage from contact moves by 50%, but Fire-type moves do double damage. Fire-type moves that make contact do regular damage.

Forewarn.name: Forewarn
Forewarn.effect: Determines what moves a foe has.

Frisk.name: Frisk
Frisk.effect: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

Full Metal Body.name: Full Metal Body
Full Metal Body.effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

Fur Coat.name: Fur Coat
Fur Coat.effect: Fur Coat reduces damage taken from physical attacks by 50%.

Galvanize.name: Galvanize
Galvanize.effect: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves and their power boosted.

Gluttony.name: Gluttony
Gluttony.effect: A Pokémon with Gluttony will use a pinch berry when its HP drops to 50%, rather than the usual 25%.

Gooey.name: Gooey
Gooey.effect: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

Gorilla Tactics.name: Gorilla Tactics
Gorilla Tactics.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.

Grass Pelt.name: Grass Pelt
Grass Pelt.effect: Boosts the Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.

Grassy Surge.name: Grassy Surge
Grassy Surge.effect: Grassy Surge creates a low-lying grassy field, like the move Grassy Terrain , when the Pokémon enters battle. It restores the HP of grounded Pokémon each turn and increases the power of Grass type attacks.

Grim Neigh.name: Grim Neigh
Grim Neigh.effect: Boosts Special Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.

Guard Dog.name: Guard Dog
Guard Dog.effect: Boosts Attack if intimidated, and prevents being forced to switch out.

Gulp Missile.name: Gulp Missile
Gulp Missile.effect: Gulp Missile is the signature ability of Cramorant . If Cramorant uses the move Surf or Dive , it returns with a fish in its mouth. If Cramorant then takes damage, it retaliates by spitting out the fish, dealing extra damage.

Guts.name: Guts
Guts.effect: Guts raises the ability-bearer's Attack by 50% when inflicted by a major status ailment (poison, burn, paralysis, freeze or sleep). If burnt, the Pokémon does not suffer the usual drop in Attack.

Hadron Engine.name: Hadron Engine
Hadron Engine.effect: Creates an Electric Terrain when entering battle, and boosts Special Attack while active.

Harvest.name: Harvest
Harvest.effect: May create another Berry after one is used.

Healer.name: Healer
Healer.effect: May heal an ally's status conditions.

Heatproof.name: Heatproof
Heatproof.effect: Heatproof reduces the damage taken from Fire -type moves by 50%. It also halves the damage from a burn, from 1 ⁄ 8 to 1 ⁄ 16 of the Pokémon's maximum HP.

Heavy Metal.name: Heavy Metal
Heavy Metal.effect: Heavy Metal doubles the Pokémon's weight in battle. Increasing weight affects these moves:

Honey Gather.name: Honey Gather
Honey Gather.effect: Honey Gather has no effect in battle.

Hospitality.name: Hospitality
Hospitality.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it showers its ally with hospitality, restoring a small amount of the ally's HP.

Hunger Switch.name: Hunger Switch
Hunger Switch.effect: Hunger Switch causes Morpeko to change its form each turn, alternating between Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode. Morpeko's form also changes the type of its signature move, Aura Wheel .

Hustle.name: Hustle
Hustle.effect: Hustle increases the ability-bearer's Attack by 50%, however, it also reduces the Accuracy of all Physical moves by 20%.

Hydration.name: Hydration
Hydration.effect: A Pokémon with Hydration will cure itself of any status conditions during rain, at the end of each turn. This includes self-inflicted conditions such as from using Rest .

Hyper Cutter.name: Hyper Cutter
Hyper Cutter.effect: Hyper Cutter prevents the bearer's Attack stat from being lowered by other Pokémon, through moves such as Growl or abilities such as Intimidate .

Ice Body.name: Ice Body
Ice Body.effect: A Pokémon with Ice Body will recover 1 ⁄ 16 of its maximum HP during hail, after each turn. It also grants immunity to the hailstorm damage, if not already immune.

Ice Face.name: Ice Face
Ice Face.effect: Ice Face is the signature ability of Eiscue . It allows the Pokémon to take a physical attack without taking damage. After the attack, Eiscue changes to its No Ice Face form, however, it can be restored in hail.

Illuminate.name: Illuminate
Illuminate.effect: Illuminate has no effect in battle.

Illusion.name: Illusion
Illusion.effect: When a Pokémon with the Illusion ability switches into battle, it takes the form of the Pokémon in last place (6th) of the player's party. Illusion will not activate if the Pokémon in last place is the same species or is fainted.

Immunity.name: Immunity
Immunity.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.

Imposter.name: Imposter
Imposter.effect: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.

Infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
Infiltrator.effect: Infiltrator ignores the effects of Reflect , Light Screen and Safeguard . In other words, if the opponent has used Safeguard, Toxic would still badly poison them.

Innards Out.name: Innards Out
Innards Out.effect: When a Pokémon with Innards Out faints, it deals damage to the opponent equal to amount of damage it took on the final blow.

Inner Focus.name: Inner Focus
Inner Focus.effect: Inner Focus prevents the Pokémon from flinching, for example when attacked by a move like Headbutt .

Insomnia.name: Insomnia
Insomnia.effect: Insomnia prevents the ability-bearer from falling asleep, both from moves by other Pokémon like Sing , and self-inflicted sleep like Rest .

Intimidate.name: Intimidate
Intimidate.effect: Intimidate lower's the Attack of all opponents by one stage when the ability-bearer switches in (including the start of a battle).

Iron Barbs.name: Iron Barbs
Iron Barbs.effect: When a Pokémon with Iron Barbs is hit by a move that makes contact, the attacker receives damage equal to 1 ⁄ 8 of their maximum HP.

Iron Fist.name: Iron Fist
Iron Fist.effect: Iron Fist increases the power of all punching moves by 20%.

Justified.name: Justified
Justified.effect: Justified raises the ability-bearer's Attack by one stage when hit by a damaging Dark -type move.

Keen Eye.name: Keen Eye
Keen Eye.effect: Keen Eye prevents the Pokémon from losing accuracy, for example from moves like Sand-Attack .

Klutz.name: Klutz
Klutz.effect: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

Leaf Guard.name: Leaf Guard
Leaf Guard.effect: Leaf Guard prevents the bearer from succumbing to major status ailments (sleep, burns, poisoning, paralysis or freezing) during sunny weather.

Levitate.name: Levitate
Levitate.effect: Levitate causes the Pokémon to be raised (like Flying -type Pokémon).

Libero.name: Libero
Libero.effect: Libero changes the Pokémon's type to that of its previously used attack.

Light Metal.name: Light Metal
Light Metal.effect: Light Metal halves the Pokémon's weight in battle. Decreasing weight affects these moves:

Lightning Rod.name: Lightning Rod
Lightning Rod.effect: Lightning Rod forces all single-target Electric -type moves - used by any other Pokémon on the field - to target this Pokémon, and with 100% accuracy. This includes the status move Thunder Wave . The ability is most useful in double/triple battles.

Limber.name: Limber
Limber.effect: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

Lingering Aroma.name: Lingering Aroma
Lingering Aroma.effect: Contact changes the attacker's Ability to Lingering Aroma.

Liquid Ooze.name: Liquid Ooze
Liquid Ooze.effect: Damages attackers using any draining move.

Liquid Voice.name: Liquid Voice
Liquid Voice.effect: Liquid Voice causes all sound-based moves used by the Pokémon to become Water type. Water type Pokémon also gain STAB from those moves.

Long Reach.name: Long Reach
Long Reach.effect: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

Magic Guard.name: Magic Guard
Magic Guard.effect: Magic Guard protects the Pokémon from indirect damage, including:

Magician.name: Magician
Magician.effect: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

Magma Armor.name: Magma Armor
Magma Armor.effect: Magma Armor prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen, for example from moves like Blizzard .

Magnet Pull.name: Magnet Pull
Magnet Pull.effect: Magnet Pull prevents Steel type Pokémon from switching out of battle or fleeing.

Marvel Scale.name: Marvel Scale
Marvel Scale.effect: Marvel Scale raises the ability-bearer's Defense by 50% when inflicted by a major status ailment (poison, burn, paralysis, freeze or sleep).

Mega Launcher.name: Mega Launcher
Mega Launcher.effect: Mega Launcher increases the power of all aura and pulse moves by 50%. Heal Pulse boosts the HP restored by 50%.

Merciless.name: Merciless
Merciless.effect: The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.effect: Changes type depending on the terrain.

Mind's Eye.name: Mind's Eye
Mind's Eye.effect: The Pokémon ignores changes to opponents' evasiveness, its accuracy can't be lowered, and it can hit Ghost types with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.

Minus.name: Minus
Minus.effect: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

Misty Surge.name: Misty Surge
Misty Surge.effect: Misty Surge creates a low-lying mist, like the move Misty Terrain , when the bearer enters battle. It protects all grounded Pokémon from status conditions and halves the power of Dragon type attacks.

Mold Breaker.name: Mold Breaker
Mold Breaker.effect: Mold Breaker prevents a target's ability from affecting moves that the Mold Breaker Pokémon uses. It only affects abilities that change the power, accuracy or other effects of moves.

Moody.name: Moody
Moody.effect: Raises one stat and lowers another.

Motor Drive.name: Motor Drive
Motor Drive.effect: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.

Moxie.name: Moxie
Moxie.effect: Moxie increases the user's Attack one stage upon fainting an opponent.

Multiscale.name: Multiscale
Multiscale.effect: Reduces damage when HP is full.

Multitype.name: Multitype
Multitype.effect: Multitype changes the ability-bearer's type if it is holding one of the Type Plate items. Moves of the corresponding type receive STAB .

Mummy.name: Mummy
Mummy.effect: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.

Mycelium Might.name: Mycelium Might
Mycelium Might.effect: Status moves go last, but are not affected by the opponent's ability.

Natural Cure.name: Natural Cure
Natural Cure.effect: All status problems heal when it switches out.

Neuroforce.name: Neuroforce
Neuroforce.effect: Powers up moves that are super effective.

Neutralizing Gas.name: Neutralizing Gas
Neutralizing Gas.effect: Neutralizes abilities of all Pokémon in battle.

No Guard.name: No Guard
No Guard.effect: No Guard ensures that all attacks used by, and targeted at, the ability-bearer hit without fail.

Normalize.name: Normalize
Normalize.effect: Normalize causes all moves used by the Pokémon to become Normal -type, and attacking moves increase in power by 20%.

Oblivious.name: Oblivious
Oblivious.effect: Oblivious makes the Pokémon immune to gender-based moves and abilities, specifically Attract , Captivate and Cute Charm .

Opportunist.name: Opportunist
Opportunist.effect: Copies stat boosts by the opponent.

Orichalcum Pulse.name: Orichalcum Pulse
Orichalcum Pulse.effect: Turns the sunlight harsh when entering battle, and boosts Attack while active.

Overcoat.name: Overcoat
Overcoat.effect: Overcoat makes the Pokémon immune to residual damage from weather conditions (specifically Hail and Sandstorm ).

Overgrow.name: Overgrow
Overgrow.effect: Overgrow increases the power of Grass -type moves by 50% (1.5×) when the ability-bearer's HP falls below a third of its maximum (known in-game as in a pinch ).

Own Tempo.name: Own Tempo
Own Tempo.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

Parental Bond.name: Parental Bond
Parental Bond.effect: Parental Bond allows the ability-bearer to attack twice. The second attack hits with 25% of the power, so in effect it is equivalent to a 25% boost to all attacks.

Pastel Veil.name: Pastel Veil
Pastel Veil.effect: Pastel Veil prevents the Pokémon and its teammates from being poisoned. It also cures teammates of poisoning when it enters the battlefield.

Perish Body.name: Perish Body
Perish Body.effect: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.

Pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
Pickpocket.effect: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

Pickup.name: Pickup
Pickup.effect: When another Pokémon on the field uses a single-use held item, a Pokémon with Pickup will obtain the used item (if they are not already holding anything) and it can be used again.

Pixilate.name: Pixilate
Pixilate.effect: Pixilate causes all Normal -type attacking moves used by the Pokémon to become Fairy -type, and increase in power by 20%.

Plus.name: Plus
Plus.effect: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

Poison Heal.name: Poison Heal
Poison Heal.effect: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.

Poison Point.name: Poison Point
Poison Point.effect: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

Poison Puppeteer.name: Poison Puppeteer
Poison Puppeteer.effect: Pokémon poisoned by Pecharunt’s moves will also become confused.

Poison Touch.name: Poison Touch
Poison Touch.effect: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

Power Construct.name: Power Construct
Power Construct.effect: Power Construct is unique to Zygarde. When Zygarde 10% Forme or Zygarde 50% Forme falls below half HP, it changes into Zygarde Complete Forme.

Power of Alchemy.name: Power of Alchemy
Power of Alchemy.effect: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

Power Spot.name: Power Spot
Power Spot.effect: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.

Prankster.name: Prankster
Prankster.effect: Prankster increases the priority of status moves by +1.

Pressure.name: Pressure
Pressure.effect: Pressure makes any attack targeted at the ability-bearer - regardless of whether it hits - use 2 PP instead of 1.

Primordial Sea.name: Primordial Sea
Primordial Sea.effect: Primordial Sea creates heavy rain when the ability is activated (by Kyogre reverting to its Primal form).

Prism Armor.name: Prism Armor
Prism Armor.effect: Prism Armor reduces the damage taken from super-effective attacks by 25%. It is not affected by the abilities Mold Breaker , Teravolt , or Turboblaze .

Propeller Tail.name: Propeller Tail
Propeller Tail.effect: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.

Protean.name: Protean
Protean.effect: Protean changes the Pokémon's type to that of its previously used attack.

Protosynthesis.name: Protosynthesis
Protosynthesis.effect: Raises highest stat in harsh sunlight, or if holding Booster Energy.

Psychic Surge.name: Psychic Surge
Psychic Surge.effect: Psychic Surge creates a low-lying psychic field, like the move Psychic Terrain , when the Pokémon enters battle. It prevents high-priority moves being used and increases the power of Psychic type attacks.

Punk Rock.name: Punk Rock
Punk Rock.effect: Boosts sound-based moves and halves damage from the same moves.

Purifying Salt.name: Purifying Salt
Purifying Salt.effect: Protects from status conditions and halves damage from Ghost-type moves.

Quark Drive.name: Quark Drive
Quark Drive.effect: Raises highest stat on Electric Terrain, or if holding Booster Energy.

Quick Feet.name: Quick Feet
Quick Feet.effect: Quick Feet raises the ability-bearer's Speed by 50% when inflicted by a major status ailment (poison, burn, paralysis, freeze or sleep). If paralyzed, the Pokémon does not suffer the usual drop in Speed.

Rain Dish.name: Rain Dish
Rain Dish.effect: A Pokémon with Rain Dish will recover 1 ⁄ 16 of its maximum HP during rain, after each turn.

Rattled.name: Rattled
Rattled.effect: When a Pokémon with Rattled is hit by a Bug , Ghost or Dark type move, its Speed is raised one stage (up to the usual maximum of +6 stages).

Receiver.name: Receiver
Receiver.effect: A Pokémon with Receiver will inherit the ability of a teammate in a double/triple battle when that teammate faints.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.effect: Reckless increases the power of recoil moves by 20%. By extension, this means the amount of recoil damage taken will increase as more damage is dealt (except for High Jump Kick and Jump Kick which are based on the user's HP).

Refrigerate.name: Refrigerate
Refrigerate.effect: Refrigerate causes all Normal -type attacking moves used by the Pokémon to become Ice -type, and increase in power by 20%.

Regenerator.name: Regenerator
Regenerator.effect: A Pokémon with Regenerator restores 1 ⁄ 3 of its maximum HP when switching out.

Rivalry.name: Rivalry
Rivalry.effect: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.

RKS System.name: RKS System
RKS System.effect: Changes type depending on held item.

Rock Head.name: Rock Head
Rock Head.effect: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

Rocky Payload.name: Rocky Payload
Rocky Payload.effect: Rocky Payload increases the power of Rock-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%.

Rough Skin.name: Rough Skin
Rough Skin.effect: When a Pokémon with Rough Skin is hit by a move that makes contact, the attacker receives damage equal to 1 ⁄ 8 of their maximum HP.

Run Away.name: Run Away
Run Away.effect: Run Away allows the bearer to flee a battle with a wild Pokémon without fail, even if the opposing Pokémon has used a move like Mean Look or Bind , or has an ability such as Arena Trap .

Sand Force.name: Sand Force
Sand Force.effect: Sand Force raises the power of Ground , Rock and Steel type moves by 30% during a sandstorm .

Sand Rush.name: Sand Rush
Sand Rush.effect: Sand Rush doubles the ability-bearer's Speed during a sandstorm .

Sand Spit.name: Sand Spit
Sand Spit.effect: Creates a sandstorm when hit by an attack.

Sand Stream.name: Sand Stream
Sand Stream.effect: Sand Stream creates a sandstorm when the ability-bearer enters battle. The effect lasts 5 turns, unless it is cleared via Air Lock or Cloud Nine or replaced by another weather condition.

Sand Veil.name: Sand Veil
Sand Veil.effect: Sand Veil raises the ability-bearer's evasion by 20% in a sandstorm . It also gives immunity to sandstorm damage (if they are not already protected by being Ground / Rock / Steel type).

Sap Sipper.name: Sap Sipper
Sap Sipper.effect: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

Schooling.name: Schooling
Schooling.effect: Schooling changes Wishiwashi into its School Form, if its HP is above 25% and Wishiwashi is at least level 20. If its HP falls below 25%, Wishiwashi will revert back to Solo Form.

Scrappy.name: Scrappy
Scrappy.effect: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

Screen Cleaner.name: Screen Cleaner
Screen Cleaner.effect: Nullifies effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil.

Seed Sower.name: Seed Sower
Seed Sower.effect: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

Serene Grace.name: Serene Grace
Serene Grace.effect: Serene Grace doubles the chance of moves' secondary effects occurring - specifically stat changes, status ailments, or flinching. It also increases the chance of flinching due to the held items King's Rock and Razor Fang from 10% to 20% (however, note that those items do not affect moves that already have a flinch chance).

Shadow Shield.name: Shadow Shield
Shadow Shield.effect: Reduces damage when HP is full.

Sharpness.name: Sharpness
Sharpness.effect: Sharpness increases the power of all slicing moves by 50%.

Shed Skin.name: Shed Skin
Shed Skin.effect: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

Sheer Force.name: Sheer Force
Sheer Force.effect: Sheer Force increases the power of moves that have beneficial secondary effects by 30%, but removes those additional effects.

Shell Armor.name: Shell Armor
Shell Armor.effect: Shell Armor prevents the Pokémon from receiving a critical hit.

Shield Dust.name: Shield Dust
Shield Dust.effect: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

Shields Down.name: Shields Down
Shields Down.effect: Shields Down causes the Pokémon to changes its appearance and stats depending on its remaining HP.

Simple.name: Simple
Simple.effect: The Simple ability doubles the number of stages of all stat changes. Stats can be raised to a maximum of +6 stages each, or lowered to a minimum of -6 stages each.

Skill Link.name: Skill Link
Skill Link.effect: Skill Link causes multi-strike moves to always hit their maximum number of times. The moves affected are listed below; note that moves such as Double Kick that always strike the same number of times are not affected.

Slush Rush.name: Slush Rush
Slush Rush.effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.

Sniper.name: Sniper
Sniper.effect: Sniper increases the power of critical hits by 1.5×. This means a critical hit will deal 2.25× normal damage instead of 1.5×.

Snow Cloak.name: Snow Cloak
Snow Cloak.effect: Snow Cloak raises ability-bearer's evasion by 20% in a hail storm. It also gives immunity to damage by hail (if they are not already protected by being Ice type).

Snow Warning.name: Snow Warning
Snow Warning.effect: Snow Warning creates a hailstorm when the ability-bearer enters battle. The effect lasts 5 turns, unless it is cleared via Air Lock or Cloud Nine or replaced by another weather condition.

Solar Power.name: Solar Power
Solar Power.effect: During harsh sunlight, Solar Power raises the ability-bearer's Special Attack by 50%, but it also loses 1 ⁄ 8 of its maximum HP after each turn.

Solid Rock.name: Solid Rock
Solid Rock.effect: Solid Rock reduces the damage taken from super-effective attacks by 25%.

Soul-Heart.name: Soul-Heart
Soul-Heart.effect: Soul-Heart raises the bearer's Special Attack one stage when any Pokémon on the field faints.

Soundproof.name: Soundproof
Soundproof.effect: Soundproof grants the Pokémon immunity to all sound-based moves, preventing all damage and effects.

Speed Boost.name: Speed Boost
Speed Boost.effect: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.

Stakeout.name: Stakeout
Stakeout.effect: Stakeout enables the Pokémon to deal twice the normal damage to any Pokémon that switches in or enters the field mid-battle.

Stall.name: Stall
Stall.effect: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.

Stalwart.name: Stalwart
Stalwart.effect: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.

Stamina.name: Stamina
Stamina.effect: Stamina raises the bearer's Defense by one stage when it is attacked by any move.

Stance Change.name: Stance Change
Stance Change.effect: Stance Change is exclusive to Aegislash . When using a damage-dealing move, Aegislash switches to its Blade Forme. When using the move King's Shield , Aegislash switches to its Shield Forme.

Static.name: Static
Static.effect: If a Pokémon with Static is hit by a move making contact, there is a 30% chance the foe will become paralyzed.

Steadfast.name: Steadfast
Steadfast.effect: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

Steam Engine.name: Steam Engine
Steam Engine.effect: Steam Engine raises the user's Speed by three stages when it is hit by a Fire- or Water-type attack. The attack still deals damage.

Steelworker.name: Steelworker
Steelworker.effect: Steelworker increases the power of Steel-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%.

Steely Spirit.name: Steely Spirit
Steely Spirit.effect: Powers up ally Pokémon's Steel-type moves.

Stench.name: Stench
Stench.effect: A Pokémon with Stench has a 10% chance of causing the opponent to flinch when hit by a damaging move (provided the ability-bearer strikes first as usual).

Sticky Hold.name: Sticky Hold
Sticky Hold.effect: Sticky Hold prevents held items from being taken or switched.

Storm Drain.name: Storm Drain
Storm Drain.effect: Storm Drain forces all single-target Water -type moves - used by any other Pokémon on the field - to target this Pokémon, and with 100% accuracy. The ability is most useful in double/triple battles.

Strong Jaw.name: Strong Jaw
Strong Jaw.effect: Strong Jaw increases the power of all biting moves by 50%.

Sturdy.name: Sturdy
Sturdy.effect: Sturdy allows the Pokémon to survive with 1 HP if attacked at full HP with an attack that would otherwise knock it out. It also prevents One-Hit-KO moves ( Fissure , Horn Drill , Guillotine or Sheer Cold ).

Suction Cups.name: Suction Cups
Suction Cups.effect: Suction Cups prevents opponents forcing the ability-bearer to switch out or flee via the moves Roar , Whirlwind , Circle Throw , or Dragon Tail , or the item Red Card .

Super Luck.name: Super Luck
Super Luck.effect: Super Luck raises the ability-bearer's critical-hit ratio by one stage (for most moves this increases from a 1 ⁄ 16 chance to 1 ⁄ 8 ).

Supersweet Syrup.name: Supersweet Syrup
Supersweet Syrup.effect: A sickly sweet scent spreads across the field the first time the Pokémon enters a battle, lowering the evasiveness of opposing Pokémon.

Supreme Overlord.name: Supreme Overlord
Supreme Overlord.effect: Attack and Special Attack are boosted for each party Pokémon that has been defeated.

Surge Surfer.name: Surge Surfer
Surge Surfer.effect: Surge Surfer doubles the bearer's Speed when Electric Terrain is active.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.effect: Swarm increases the power of Bug -type moves by 50% (1.5×) when the ability-bearer's HP falls below a third of its maximum (known in-game as in a pinch ).

Sweet Veil.name: Sweet Veil
Sweet Veil.effect: Sweet Veil prevents this Pokémon and its allies from falling asleep, for example from moves like Hypnosis .

Swift Swim.name: Swift Swim
Swift Swim.effect: Swift Swim doubles the ability-bearer's Speed during rain .

Sword of Ruin.name: Sword of Ruin
Sword of Ruin.effect: Lowers Defense of all Pokémon except itself.

Symbiosis.name: Symbiosis
Symbiosis.effect: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.

Synchronize.name: Synchronize
Synchronize.effect: If the opponent causes a burn, paralysis, or poisoning of a Pokémon with Synchronize , the opponent receives the status condition too. Self-inflicted status conditions (for example through the use of an item) are not passed on.

Tablets of Ruin.name: Tablets of Ruin
Tablets of Ruin.effect: Lowers Attack of all Pokémon except itself.

Tangled Feet.name: Tangled Feet
Tangled Feet.effect: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

Tangling Hair.name: Tangling Hair
Tangling Hair.effect: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

Technician.name: Technician
Technician.effect: Technician increases the power of moves - that are usually base power 60 or below - by 50%.

Telepathy.name: Telepathy
Telepathy.effect: Pokémon with the Telepathy ability will not take damage from teammates in double and triple battles.

Tera Shell.name: Tera Shell
Tera Shell.effect: The Pokémon’s shell contains the powers of each type. All damage-dealing moves that hit the Pokémon when its HP is full will not be very effective.

Tera Shift.name: Tera Shift
Tera Shift.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it absorbs the energy around itself and transforms into its Terastal Form.

Teraform Zero.name: Teraform Zero
Teraform Zero.effect: When Terapagos changes into its Stellar Form, it uses its hidden powers to eliminate all effects of weather and terrain, reducing them to zero.

Teravolt.name: Teravolt
Teravolt.effect: Teravolt prevents a target's ability from affecting moves that the Teravolt Pokémon uses. It only affects abilities that change the power, accuracy or other effects of moves.

Thermal Exchange.name: Thermal Exchange
Thermal Exchange.effect: Raises Attack when hit by a Fire-type move. Cannot be burned.

Thick Fat.name: Thick Fat
Thick Fat.effect: Thick Fat reduces the damage taken from Fire -type and Ice -type moves by 50%.

Torrent.name: Torrent
Torrent.effect: Torrent increases the power of Water -type moves by 50% (1.5×) when the ability-bearer's HP falls below a third of its maximum (known in-game as in a pinch ).

Tough Claws.name: Tough Claws
Tough Claws.effect: Tough Claws increases the power of moves that make contact.

Toxic Boost.name: Toxic Boost
Toxic Boost.effect: Powers up physical attacks when poisoned.

Toxic Chain.name: Toxic Chain
Toxic Chain.effect: Toxic Chain may cause bad poisoning when the Pokémon hits an opponent with a move.

Toxic Debris.name: Toxic Debris
Toxic Debris.effect: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.

Trace.name: Trace
Trace.effect: The Pokémon copies a foe's Ability.

Transistor.name: Transistor
Transistor.effect: Transistor increases the power of Electric-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%.

Triage.name: Triage
Triage.effect: Triage increases the priority of HP-restoring moves to +3, when used by the ability-bearer.

Truant.name: Truant
Truant.effect: Truant causes the ability-bearer to only attack every alternate turn. On the even turns, it will say the Pokémon is loafing around .

Turboblaze.name: Turboblaze
Turboblaze.effect: Turboblaze prevents a target's ability from affecting moves that the Turboblaze Pokémon uses. It only affects abilities that change the power, accuracy or other effects of moves.

Unaware.name: Unaware
Unaware.effect: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.

Unburden.name: Unburden
Unburden.effect: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

Unnerve.name: Unnerve
Unnerve.effect: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

Unseen Fist.name: Unseen Fist
Unseen Fist.effect: Contact moves can strike through Protect/Detect.

Vessel of Ruin.name: Vessel of Ruin
Vessel of Ruin.effect: Lowers Special Attack of all Pokémon except itself.

Victory Star.name: Victory Star
Victory Star.effect: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.

Vital Spirit.name: Vital Spirit
Vital Spirit.effect: Vital Spirit prevents the ability-bearer from falling asleep. This means that it also prevents the use of the move Rest .

Volt Absorb.name: Volt Absorb
Volt Absorb.effect: A Pokémon with Volt Absorb heals 1 ⁄ 4 of its maximum HP when hit by an Electric -type attack, including Thunder Wave .

Wandering Spirit.name: Wandering Spirit
Wandering Spirit.effect: Swaps abilities with opponents on contact.

Water Absorb.name: Water Absorb
Water Absorb.effect: A Pokémon with Water Absorb heals 1 ⁄ 4 of its maximum HP when hit by a Water -type attack.

Water Bubble.name: Water Bubble
Water Bubble.effect: Water Bubble reduces damage taken from Fire-type moves by 50%, and doubles the power of Water-type moves used by the ability-bearer. It also prevents the Pokémon from being burned.

Water Compaction.name: Water Compaction
Water Compaction.effect: Water Compaction raises the bearer's Defense by 2 stages when it is hit by a Water-type move.

Water Veil.name: Water Veil
Water Veil.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

Weak Armor.name: Weak Armor
Weak Armor.effect: When a Pokémon with Weak Armor is hit by a physical move, its Defense drops one stage, but its Speed increases by one stage.

Well-Baked Body.name: Well-Baked Body
Well-Baked Body.effect: Immune to Fire-type moves, and Defense is sharply boosted.

White Smoke.name: White Smoke
White Smoke.effect: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

Wimp Out.name: Wimp Out
Wimp Out.effect: Wimp Out causes the bearer to switch out (or flee in a wild battle) when its HP falls below 50%.

Wind Power.name: Wind Power
Wind Power.effect: If a Pokémon with Wind Power is hit by a wind move, the power of the next Electric-type move it uses is doubled.

Wind Rider.name: Wind Rider
Wind Rider.effect: Wind Rider gives immunity to wind moves, and causes the Pokémon's Attack to increase by one stage when hit by one.

Wonder Guard.name: Wonder Guard
Wonder Guard.effect: Wonder Guard prevents damage from direct attacks unless they are super-effective. Shedinja is the only Pokémon to have this ability so this means that only Fire , Flying , Rock , Ghost and Dark moves will have an effect.

Wonder Skin.name: Wonder Skin
Wonder Skin.effect: Wonder Skin halves the accuracy of all status moves targeted at the ability-bearer.

Zen Mode.name: Zen Mode
Zen Mode.effect: Zen Mode changes the ability-bearer's form to Zen Mode when their health falls below 50%.

Zero to Hero.name: Zero to Hero
Zero to Hero.effect: Transforms into its Hero Form when switching out.
